sect1.title: cvs commit/ci
sect1.para: cvs commit or cvs ci. This command recursively sends your changes to the CVS server. It will commit changed files, added files and deleted files. The -m option can be used to pass a log message to the command. If you don't specify a -m "MESSAGE", then it will open the default editor and ask you to type in a log. Please don't use empty log messages (see later in this document on the policy which governs them).
